text: Philippi (pronounced 'FILL-uh-pea') is a city in — and the county seat of — Barbour County, West Virginia, United States. The population was 2,929 at the 2020 census. The 1861 Battle of Philippi was fought in the city during the American Civil War. == References == Category:Cities in West Virginia Category:County seats in West Virginia
title: Philippi, West Virginia
